scripts.weather-fast: game server hook --world default {Obstacles:0,ObstacleMaxMomentum:1} && game server hook --world default {Obstacles:15}
scripts.weather-default: game server hook --world default {Obstacles:0,ObstacleMaxMomentum:0.1} && game server hook --world default {Obstacles:15}
scripts.ctf-cyan: game player robots --type-name Game.Robots.CTFBot,Game.Robots --name ctf-bot --world ctf --sprite ship_cyan --color cyan --replicas 2
scripts.ctf-red: game player robots --type-name Game.Robots.CTFBot,Game.Robots --name ctf-bot --world ctf --sprite ship_red --color red --replicas 2
